About.title: About Me
About.subtitle: What I do
description: I’m Talha Jamil, a Fullstack Developer who loves crafting digital experiences that feel smooth, modern, and engaging.
From sleek web platforms with React, Next.js, and TailwindCSS to powerful mobile apps with React Native, I bring ideas to life with clean code and creative design.
On the backend, I use Node.js, Supabase, and APIs to build secure, scalable, and reliable systems.
Blending UI/UX design thinking with performance-focused development, I make products that not only look great but also work flawlessly.
I enjoy turning complex ideas into simple, intuitive solutions that deliver real value.
If you’re looking for someone who can handle the entire stack while keeping users at the center, I’m ready to collaborate.

Contact.title: Let's Work Together
Contact.subtitle1: Looking for a passionate Fullstack Developer who can build clean,        responsive, and user-friendly web and mobile applications — from        frontend design to backend architecture?
Contact.subtitle2: Whether it’s freelance work, collaboration, or a full-time role — I’d love to connect and help bring your ideas to life!

Footer.title: Talha Jamil. All rights reserved.
